text: I have had the worst encounter with this guy and agency. He never responds to calls, text, email. Even if you advise this is an urgent matter he won’t return any of your calls. I do not recommend, this was a terrible choice of insurance. Choose wisely.

name: JMichael Taylor
text:
Josh was helpful with info. I've driven 40 years with only one claim. Was not sure how to proceed with storm damage to my convertible top on my car.
These guys are friendly and helpful. Between my wife and I, we have been with State Farm for 30 years.

name: Matthew Eubanks
text: I couldn’t be more pleased with my recent dealings with Joshua and the entire staff at Bradberry! When they held my home insurance, they were always helpful. When I recently sold my home in Tuscaloosa, they guided me through a lengthy process to cancel my flood insurance through FEMA. They handled forms, inquiries, and information requests for me quickly, and they answered all my questions with ease. Even from 3 states away, they made the process effortless for me. I hated to leave them when I moved to another state. If ever back in Tuscaloosa, my first call will be to Bradberry for all my insurance needs!

name: Terre Currey
text:
We have been with Phil Bradberry for over 20 years and have been extremely pleased with every aspect of his business. His staff is knowledgeable and courteous. Phil is willing to take whatever amount of time you need to discuss coverage questions - investigate new policies - make sure your policy coverage is adequate.
I would highly recommend this agency to anyone.

name: Josetta Greene
text: Mr. Bradberry 's office resolve my  concerns in a matter of minutes. Ms. Amy help make my transition from ALFA to State Farm very easy. No waiting period ,coverage began before I could hang up the phone . I also received verification/proof within 5 minutes via email. GREAT SERVICE!!! You do not have to bring vehicle to office or sign in person...!!

name: Veena Bhargava
text: Before moving to Tuscaloosa, we contacted their office to transfer our State Farm policies.  We found the office staff extremely helpful, knowledgeable, and efficient.  After moving to Tuscaloosa, the office staff was very helpful in providing local references for various businesses.  We were very impressed by their customer service.

name: Jim Treacy
text: Philip and his staff are awesome!  Whenever we've had to file a claim or change status on any of our policies, they have been quick and handled every detail without us needing to worry about a thing.

name: Tabatha festa
text: Insurance is way to high i have already been told they rip people off big time. It doesnt cost them hardly anything to get this started. So the money they charge people most of that they stick in there pockets.

text: Failed a claim on my camper Phil and his team informed me that the damages wasn't covered. When getting the insurance was told anything that happens to the camper it would be covered it was a lie. Looking for new insurance company.

name: Andretti Daniel
text: Ken, Melissa, and the rest of the staff have always been helpful and courteous; especially before I had  insurance through their office. So, when I switched back to State Farm, Ken Seiffert's office wasn't my first consideration, it was my only consideration.

resp.text: Andretti - thank you very much for the great review and especially for the kind words.  We greatly appreciate your business!  Ken

name: Jem Key
text: Fast friendly service will answer any question

resp.text: Thank you very much for the outstanding review -  we appreciate your business!  Our goal is to always provide exceptional service for our customers.

name: Ron Heinkel
text: been doing business with state farm insurance for over half my driving years.  I left them twice only to come back.  I have dealt with 4 different agencies in 4 states and Ken has seemed like he is the friendliest.

name: Greg Green
text:
I never had any problems with State Farm. Until I had to work with their claims department. I actually fired my lawyer because I thought he was being too immoral, conniving and sleazy (even for a lawyer). I didn't want anything other than the cost of the damages that were the result of a State Farm Insured Driver rearending my parked car. That's right. My car was parked. And just decided that I would come to an agreement with the nice ppl at State Farm.

State Farm made the lawyer look like our churches youth pastor. Anyone who alignes themselves with people like that is not to be trusted. They have no problem taking your monthly payments. Just don't ever need anything else and you'll be good for State Farm.

name: Elaine Kelley
text: I havent been in the office in over a year but I walked in after a phone call to add a vehicle to my policy and she knew me as soon as I walked in. Great customer service.

text: So far, I have been very pleased with the Daniel Creel Agency. We haven't had a lot of need to interact with them, but when we have, it's always been a positive experience!

text: Daniel was able to get us a better price than we had been paying for YEARS with a competitor, and the coverage was better, too! He is always easy to reach when needed. Very professional but still very friendly. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

name: Our New Path
text: Called to compare my current rates with some new ones I got from state farm. Called this office and had to leave a voicemail asking about discounted rates. Never heard back and then they just my coverage without a return phone call. Made the decision to switch fairly easy I guess.

name: SAYMILON GRIFFIN
text: Freda will go to bat for each and every one of her customers.  She has been in this line of business for awhile and knows exactly what to do.  Her experience in insurance needs is evident in how she treats her clients.  She understands how important protecting your assets are and will deliver.

name: Tom McClung
text: Being a new location just starting, I thought there may have been some issues with lack of training or customer service not up to my expectations. I could not have been more wrong. The staff along with Freda Anderson were extremely nice. I explained what I needed and they couldn't have been more helpful. Freda worked hand in hand with my rep Anna McClung and all of my insurance needs were met. I am waiting to sign my boat with them as soon as my other policy expires. I recommend them to everyone!!!

name: Melody Murray Zaragoza
text: Freda is an awesome insurance agent! Her staff are friendly and helpful. Freda does her best to cover your insurance needs.

name: Marie Eubanks
text: Not only do I recommend Freda to my clients but, she handles my family's insurance needs too!!  You won't find any better customer service!!!  Call her for a quote before you commit to any other company!!

name: JMichael Taylor
text:
Josh was helpful with info. I've driven 40 years with only one claim. Was not sure how to proceed with storm damage to my convertible top on my car.
These guys are friendly and helpful. Between my wife and I, we have been with State Farm for 30 years.

name: Matthew Eubanks
text: I couldn’t be more pleased with my recent dealings with Joshua and the entire staff at Bradberry! When they held my home insurance, they were always helpful. When I recently sold my home in Tuscaloosa, they guided me through a lengthy process to cancel my flood insurance through FEMA. They handled forms, inquiries, and information requests for me quickly, and they answered all my questions with ease. Even from 3 states away, they made the process effortless for me. I hated to leave them when I moved to another state. If ever back in Tuscaloosa, my first call will be to Bradberry for all my insurance needs!

name: Terre Currey
text:
We have been with Phil Bradberry for over 20 years and have been extremely pleased with every aspect of his business. His staff is knowledgeable and courteous. Phil is willing to take whatever amount of time you need to discuss coverage questions - investigate new policies - make sure your policy coverage is adequate.
I would highly recommend this agency to anyone.

name: Josetta Greene
text: Mr. Bradberry 's office resolve my  concerns in a matter of minutes. Ms. Amy help make my transition from ALFA to State Farm very easy. No waiting period ,coverage began before I could hang up the phone . I also received verification/proof within 5 minutes via email. GREAT SERVICE!!! You do not have to bring vehicle to office or sign in person...!!

name: Veena Bhargava
text: Before moving to Tuscaloosa, we contacted their office to transfer our State Farm policies.  We found the office staff extremely helpful, knowledgeable, and efficient.  After moving to Tuscaloosa, the office staff was very helpful in providing local references for various businesses.  We were very impressed by their customer service.

name: Jim Treacy
text: Philip and his staff are awesome!  Whenever we've had to file a claim or change status on any of our policies, they have been quick and handled every detail without us needing to worry about a thing.

text: Insurance is way to high i have already been told they rip people off big time. It doesnt cost them hardly anything to get this started. So the money they charge people most of that they stick in there pockets.

text: been doing business with state farm insurance for over half my driving years.  I left them twice only to come back.  I have dealt with 4 different agencies in 4 states and Ken has seemed like he is the friendliest.

name: Greg Green
text:
I never had any problems with State Farm. Until I had to work with their claims department. I actually fired my lawyer because I thought he was being too immoral, conniving and sleazy (even for a lawyer). I didn't want anything other than the cost of the damages that were the result of a State Farm Insured Driver rearending my parked car. That's right. My car was parked. And just decided that I would come to an agreement with the nice ppl at State Farm.

State Farm made the lawyer look like our churches youth pastor. Anyone who alignes themselves with people like that is not to be trusted. They have no problem taking your monthly payments. Just don't ever need anything else and you'll be good for State Farm.

text: Called to compare my current rates with some new ones I got from state farm. Called this office and had to leave a voicemail asking about discounted rates. Never heard back and then they just my coverage without a return phone call. Made the decision to switch fairly easy I guess.

name: SAYMILON GRIFFIN
text: Freda will go to bat for each and every one of her customers.  She has been in this line of business for awhile and knows exactly what to do.  Her experience in insurance needs is evident in how she treats her clients.  She understands how important protecting your assets are and will deliver.

name: Tom McClung
text: Being a new location just starting, I thought there may have been some issues with lack of training or customer service not up to my expectations. I could not have been more wrong. The staff along with Freda Anderson were extremely nice. I explained what I needed and they couldn't have been more helpful. Freda worked hand in hand with my rep Anna McClung and all of my insurance needs were met. I am waiting to sign my boat with them as soon as my other policy expires. I recommend them to everyone!!!

name: Melody Murray Zaragoza
text: Freda is an awesome insurance agent! Her staff are friendly and helpful. Freda does her best to cover your insurance needs.

text: I had two roofing companies tell me I had hail damage and Allstate would not replace my roof.  I am not very happy with them. text: Great! Agents at Kip Lowe location have always been great with helping me with my policies. Especially Mr. Jimmy Jones!

name: Elizabeth Briggs
text:
After 10 years with geico we swapped to Allstate for better rates not only for our vehicles but our home and family are now protected with the best rates in town and the best people in Montgomery! They’re always available and always friendly and helpful.
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 Stars from me!

name: Daren Singleton
text: Excellent services answers to the questions really go above and beyond in My experience to help much more than expected especially in Montgomery. Thanks Kip Low reps.   You all are great

name: Gene Kim
text: I have had to file two claims recently: one auto and one home. I haven't had to file any claims in the past ten years or so I have had a policy. On the auto the claims department did ok, however they didn't spell out the process very well. I am still waiting nearly four weeks later on an adjuster to come out and look at my home damage. This local agency has done little to help even after promising I would get a phone call. Today the person I spoke with asked if I would wait until tomorrow for another person to come back.

name: Diane Cole
text:
I just filed a claim on my roof.

The adjusters were very professional and Tammy Dickson went out of her way to help me understand the steps of the claim. This claim was handled in a timely manner and they worked with Roof Tech to complete my claim. Great job by both Allstate and Roof Tech.

name: Bonnie McGalliard
text: We love Kip abs Allstate! Couldn’t ask for better rates or better customer service! Great team!

resp.text: We're so happy to hear Bonnie! We're honored to have earned your business! - Kip Lowe & Allstate team

name: Michele Foshee
text: Excellent and  professional staff with decades of experience

name: Mary McCullough Billups
text: My experience with Allstate, as a new policy holder of their auto and home insurance, has been worry free.  I must admit changing from the other company after 20 years was something I gave some thought, but I knew I needed to do it. Julie who walked me through the process was and is always helpful, quick to respond, and very knowledgeable. She went the extra mile to make sure the transition was a smooth one and made all documents availabe to me.  I highly recommend this agency and Allstate.  The savings for me are great and the excellent protection makes my move way past due.  I found the good hands of Allstate by way of the Lowe agency. Thinking of changing companies, consider the Lowe agency. Thank you Julie, James Lowe, and the entire Allstate company.

resp.text: Mary, thank you for the great review! We truly appreciate your support. We are honored to have earned your business and are able to help assist you with your Auto and Home Insurance! Please never hesitate to reach out to us with any questions or concerns you may have!

text: I have been using this office for several years. They always take care of all my needs.

resp.text: Hello Cheryl, we thank you for sharing your experience with us. Customer Satisfaction is our top priority here at USAgencies Insurance Services. Thank you for your time and positive feedback.

text:
I have been with Allstate for a short time but, I am very please with the product and the costumer services.

I highly recommend Allstate to family members, friends and people I interact.

I was with a different company for so many years and I am glad I made the switch. I should had done it much sooner.

Thank you for all you do.

More importantly to stay in touch with costumers and making sure for their satisfaction and costumer needs.

Víctor Restrepo

resp.text:
As always, never hesitate to contact us with any questions regarding your insurance policies.

text: I have car & renters insurance through them. Addie’s been helpful and super easy to work with. The prices are better than what I previously had as well. I recommend them!

text: The agent I spoke with this morning was very professional and respectful. She had a pleasant personality it was really great experience.

name: trey lehleitner
text: I have been with State Farm for the last 15 years in multiple states. Caroline’s office is by far nicest and most responsive I’ve ever worked with. Her team always go above and beyond to make sure I get taken care of. They also have given me VERY affordable rates for several policies. Looking forward to continue doing business with Caroline and her team. Y’all are amazing!

resp.text: Thank you Trey! We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us — Our team works hard to meet customers expectations and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark! We consider ourselves lucky to have customers like you! Thanks again for continuing to trust State Farm between all your moves. We hope you and Alexis enjoy Sweet Home Alabama as much as we do!

name: Kim Rowe
text: Caroline Dorris is the most respectful and thoughtful person. She has helped me so much with my insurance. I highly recommend her for any of your insurance needs.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Chad! We’re so thankful to have policyholders like you at State Farm in Birmingham, Alabama. We hope we’ll be able to help you fulfill your insurance needs for years to come!

text:
The best insurance place I know...
CAROLINE DORRIS

name: Leah Luker
text: As a leasing agent, my clients often needed help finding renter’s insurance on the fly. When I gave them options, Caroline was at the top of my list... now that I’m a realtor, many of them are buying homes and when I ask if they have called about insurance, those who went with Caroline years ago never blink an eye. They stay with her. Even though they are given quotes from their mortgage company etc, they tell me that the “service, value, coverage, and peace of mind” they have with Caroline “can’t be beat”. Getting new business is one thing- but her ability to retain my clients’ business tells me that she is the best in the business. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Talk about a flattering recommendation! THANK YOU for the kind words Leah. I'm glad we've been able to work together for so long to help our clients and look forward to helping many more clients in the future!

name: Catherine Racciatti
text: Everything about this agency is fantastic! Caroline, the owner, was extremely helpful in finding the right insurance policy that was best suited me! I will definitely be recommending this agency to family and friends!

text: Mandy has been excellent help with quotes for my youthful driver as she tries to find the perfect car for college and with the other multitude of changes i have been in the process of making.  Thanks for all you do Mandy!

resp.text: Mandy is the real MVP! And we love helping you and your family navigate through life's changes. Bring our favorite family member by to see us soon! (no, not you Kiely ;-) )

name: Julius Rivers
text: I have been with State Farm less than a year and they have been truly good to me. I have not been a profit to them they see me as a value customer. My car was rear ended and some stuff has been happening in which I would not like to go into detail but, I do say this to my agent Bobby Huffman and Caroline Dorris they have been beyond exceptional and went out their way to help me out and I appreciate it very much. Do I recommend to people? Yes! Yes I really do and anyone that read this review I will say if you not with State Farm or you don't have insurance or look to change can I make a suggestion. Check these guys out, give them a shot or a call I would strongly suggest it. If they help me out if they can do it for me I know they can do it for you.

name: Elisabeth Kindred
text: I can always count on Caroline to meet my insurance needs. She is a very good communicator and hard worker. I know she has my best interest and will do anything to meet my needs. I could not imagine having someone else as my insurance agent.

name: JoshJake Argo
text: Contacted Jacob Tilley about a quote for homeowners and auto. He was great in breaking down the different aspects of the policy he was offering. Highly recommend using them for your insurance needs!

text: Caroline Dorris was extremely professional and respectful. She did her job very well and her staff was lovely.

resp.text: I agree, our staff is pretty amazing! -Caroline

name: Jacob Jones
text: Recently had my insurance quoted by Jacob. We had a good conversation. He explain the details of what my policy would be and made it easy to understand. Great customer service!

name: NaBeela Washington
text: I love State Farm & my insurance agent is amazing! Ms. Mcgee recognized my needs, walked me through budgeting and future finance goals, helped me explore the steps of getting life insurance and its importance (which is something I never thought I needed), and lastly she is there when I need her. The site is very easy to manage, and I enrolled for auto-deduct every month so I never have to worry about when to pay or how much. State Farm is the best insurance company I've ever had, and as a young adult, that means the world!

name: Brandi Swift
text: I was having a hard time accepting that my car insurance would increase at the other guys agency, so I talked to Caroline and her team and they got me a quote plus renters insurance for 30 dollars less than what I would've paid just for car insurance with the other guys. And within minutes! Didn't take long for me to make the jump. Really professional team.

name: Ben Vernon
text: Caroline does a great job finding ways to help her clients.  She cares about making a difference in peoples lives.  She has a lot of different products and services to offer. Caroline is as good as they come!

name: Bobby Huffman
text: Caroline has taken care of me and my family since she started her agency in 2014 , and I have the upmost respect for the way that she runs her business. If you are searching for an insurance agency that is trustworthy, knowledgeable, and is truly passionate about serving their clientele, you should definitely schedule a time to meet with these folks. It is truly remarkable how they are able to effectively, yet thoughtfully, uncover your risks, and then expertly equip you with a comprehensive plan to help alleviate those risks. Personally, what they have done for my family has led to something truly wonderful. Peace of mind.

name: Reeves Wilder

text: Ryan handles my insurance needs and I wouldn't go with anyone else! Caroline's entire agency is great and I recommend her agency to anyone.

name: Bo Gill
text: Disappointed...son was in a wreck and have heard nothing from our agent. I have been a customer of State Farm 44 years.  Getting screwed over towing bill by SF as well

resp.text: Mr. Gill - I totally understand your frustration. At our agency we have the highest standards when it comes to customer satisfaction and clear communication. I apologize that we dropped the ball early on in this claim process. I'm glad we were able to resolve the situation, towing bill and all. We are very appreciative you've trusted us for your insurance needs for so long and we hope you'll continue to trust us for 44 more years! Your business is extremely important to our agency. If you still feel unsatisfied with the outcome please do not hesitate to reach out to me personally via email or phone, and I would be happy to discuss the issue at your earliest convenience. Thanks again, Caroline

name: Ben Isbell
text: Stan and his agency are top-notch!  Very quick to respond and professional in every area.  I rely on Stan's insight/experience to provide the services needed...which he delivers in a customer centric manner. I have recommended Stan to several colleagues and family members and their experiences have all been similar.

resp.text: Ben thank you for the great review and it has been great to serve your family.

name: Grace Giovanetti
text:
Not sure where my old review went! He must have paid to have it removed. Please trust me and use another insurance agent.

Stan suddenly stopped accepting my automatic payments for no reason, then claimed he had called to tell me he needed my credit card information again. He had actually only called my parent’s house whom I hadn’t lived with since I was in high school.

resp.text: Grace, I am sorry that you have been so upset all these years and continue to provide me 1 star reviews.  The facts are if you do not pay your insurance and have a loss then your claim will not be covered.  We pay what we owe for customers that pay to have insurance.

name: stephen johnson
text: I've been a customer of Stan for over 20+ years and not looking to change. Always fast and reliable service from my vehicles to my renters insurance coverage, made sure my family and myself were always taken care of in any situation. Nothing but A-1 service and I'm glad to have an agent like Stan. Thanks Stan!!!

resp.text: Thank you Stephen and appreciate you!

name: Jeff Poleshek
text: Had a great meeting with Stan yesterday. We reviewed all our policies, discussed strategies moving forward and even had some time for family updates and a little sports talk.  He makes things so easy and understandable. We are lucky to have him here in town.

resp.text: Thank you Jeff for the awesome review!

name: Andrea Freeman
text: Stan and his staff go above and beyond for our family!! Cant say enough good things!

text: We've had 20+ years of great service from Stan and State Farm.

name: Miss E
text: Horrible customer service and inflation of prices without explanation. Do yourself a favor and find another agent.

resp.text: Miss E I do not know who you are since you did not leave your name.  However, if you truly are a customer then I am sorry for your bad experience.   As a State Farm Agent I do not set the rates but am always happy to review reasons for any increase.  Also, my agency has seasoned Staff and we pride ourselves on customer service.  My agency was named best of Birmingham in 2018 so I know we do what is right for the customer.   Unfortunately, we are not able to make everyone happy but we do try.  Thanks for leaving the review.

text: They are great to work with!!!  Love Stan Faulkner State Farm!

text: I have been with Mike and his team for almost 10yrs. Everyone is friendly and helpful. We started with car then added home and most recently added a 16yr old driver. Best insurance company hands down!

name: Matt Corbin
text: Mike and his team have taken great care of my family for years. They provide unbeatable customer service and coverage. We weren’t sure exactly what coverages made sense for our home, auto and life insurances so they took the time to walk us through different policies comparing their coverages and premiums to determine the best fit for each. We have our home, auto, and life policies all through Mike at State Farm which provides multi-line discounts/savings. I highly recommend working with them!

resp.text: Thank you Matt for the kind words, and thank you for entrusting us with your insurance needs.

name: Dominique Jones
text: First of all they sent a check to my bank account that I had already made good on and than had the nerve to say it was my fault because I came in two days later. But even so if you knew that check was sent to my account why wasn’t I told when I came in to pay. They took my money and still let my account be billed for not having the funds available to cover the check. But not to mention the fact that I was told from the beginning that it wasn’t there check that was sent out. Now I’m out of more money than I was before I borrowed the money in the first place.

name: Cynthia Dowdell
text:
Hello Huntsville,
Recently, my daughter and I relocated here so that she can attend college. Now honestly Huntsville, I have met my share of rude people, but I cannot and I will not saying I'll make such a comment towards the two nice ladies who works at Easy Money which is located at 4820 University Drive. I don't understand why their ratings are only 2.7 which is ridiculous! From my personal experience Shenikka and DeDe are the most kind and humble hearted ladies I've met and we've been living here almost one year now. We all know that when you go into an office or business you expect people to become magicians but they work in customer service. And there are some very rude people that can come and expect whatever the situation is it should automatically be okay for them to adjust but it doesn't work that way! You have to be very kind to people if you want them to be kind to you. You have to be humble when you want someone to help you and you would get the same treatment in return. So don't be fooled by this low rating that you see on this Google app because it's not true. These ladies will work with you any kind of way they can and is done without prejudice. So when you go into this store you can ask for either of them and I guarantee you they will be nice, they will be kind, and they will be very understanding of your situation and if they can help you they will. But don't go into the office or any business with a bad attitude oh, because of you bring me a bad attitude you may get one in return depend on the situation. So be very nice and kind to them as you want them to be to you. Don't say something bad about someone just because you had a messed-up situation that could not be fixed so you want to get back at a person by giving them a bad review it doesn't work that way. Be nice and kind and you'll get the same results in return. laser doing a real good job I appreciate you and keep on doing what you doing because you doing good work for this community that's so need you. And if corporate does not appreciate you for the work that you do then maybe they should come and switch places with you to see the type of situation that you deal with everyday because I think you all are doing a hell of a job and from my standpoint from what I see with my own two eyes, keep doing what you doing because your proof in the pudding of good customer service and what it's about. If if corporate does not appreciate you just know that we do parrot God bless you keep up the good work and I'm praying for your safety there it is terrible crisis that we are now in but only temporarily. Thank you very much and God bless you👍💯😘

name: Bre Blanding
text:
If I could rate with no stars I would, but in order to leave a review I have to give this unprofessional establishment one star. I came to this unprofessional establishment today to pay my loan and I was not even greeted , the employee who took my payment had an attitude from the beginning. When I proceeded to leave after I got my payment processed, I believe the manager of the poor establishment made a comment to one of her employees and said “why she looking at me like that “? And I responded by saying who ? She proceeded by saying  “why you looking at me like that “? I responded by saying ,” you looking at me , we made eye contact , I am not looking at you any kind of way calm down” The manager needs to learn some professionalism, even if I was looking at you some type of way why would you say that to an employee? It’s a shame that I cannot even go back to this location because of how I was treated today. The two employees should
Be a shame of themselves. FIND ANOTHER DAY JOB!!!

name: Michelle Rokavec
text: We were very unhappy with our current provider due to lack of communication and continued non-responsiveness, and decided we needed to make a change. After using the "esurance" site searching 'car insurance', we chose Allstate, and were contacted by them immediately. The agent we spoke with, Olivia, was fantastic! After taking down all the info, we had a detailed quote, with various coverage options, e-mailed to us within minutes. While talking with her the following day about these options, she patiently answered all our questions and clearly conveyed information. Because she was so professional, upbeat, and intelligent, we decided that this is exactly the type of person we wanted to work with. So, besides the car insurance, we decided to move ALL our insurance (Car, Home, and Wind) over to her at Allstate. Buying Insurance is a complex process and never actually 'fun', but it is far more pleasant if you are dealing with an agent and Agency you have confidence in! Thanks!

text:
I had a very friendly agent who loved to help whenever necessary.  I can recall when we a fire in our shed which also hit the house.  We left a voicemail that same night and first thing in the morning, the agent called us at the hotel with a very concerned tone and wanted to know what had happened.  We got together with the agent and put us up in a hotel for a few days and then,  he let us rent a house for about 6 months, which was paid by Farmers'.  itself.  When we returned home.  The home had been upgraded beyond our expectations.  We are still living here and still enjoy it immensely.  Farmers' as a company has been absolutely sympathetic to our dilemma and most helpful.  They were prompt in sending us and the contractor the checks so we could get back home as quickly as possible.  God bless the company and the agent in question.

Joseph Thibodeau.

text: I had very serious issue concerning my policy on a Sunday. Customer care was unable to assist me and explained I would be contacted by the agent location on the next business day. We experienced a hurricane in the area this week and there are many homes that still don’t have power. It meant a lot to me that he was willing to leave his home, travel in poor weather and go to the office to help me. He placed a call as promised once he was able to do some research and definitely eased my mind! I appreciate him assisting me. Thanks again!!!

resp.text: Lisa, thanks for the kind words.  We strive to be your first and best choice for all your insurance needs and we are glad we met your expectations.

name: Dead Wolf
text: Great service, friendly and extremely helpful staff

resp.text: Thanks!  Glad we could help!

name: Shelly Wilson
text: Always great service. Everyone is friendly and very quick to help with all your insurance needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Shelly!  We love to hear from great customers like you!

name: Beverly Graben
text:
Staff is courteous and very knowledgeable ... you will not find better customer service!  Mike
and the ladies at State Farm go above and beyond to assist with all your insurance needs . I highly recommend them .

resp.text: Thanks, Beverly!  Glad we met your expectations!

name: Devin Tanner
text: Amazing customer service! Love the staff! They are so helpful.

resp.text: Thanks, Devin!  I'll pass that along!

name: Beth Dean
text: Everyone in this office is always ready to help in any way possible.  Great agency to have.

resp.text: Thanks, Beth!  We appreciate the comment!

name: Lorri Allen
text: Great people to deal with and prompt service always delivered!!

resp.text: Thanks, Lorri!  We appreciate your business!

name: Shaeley Moore
text: Amazing customer service! Haley was super nice & very knowledgeable while answering my many questions about my quote. She even informed be about a discount I was not even aware was eligible for! Thanks for all the help!

resp.text: Great to know!  I will pass that on to her!

name: adam graben
text: High quality service from Great people!

resp.text: Thanks, Adam.....we do have some good folks here!

name: Scott Epperson
text: We have had State Farm for 30 years. But my son had a Jeep Cherokee that kept dieing on him and we had to have it towed a few times. My other son got one ticket, that with the towing claims and one small fender bender they cancelled our insurance. After 30 years. I had two teenage boys that had good driving records compared to others and lost our insurance. So we had to go somewhere else and start all over again. I wonder, if everyone's driving record was visible to the public, just how many State Farm clients have more claims than we did but still kept their coverage. One will never know.

resp.text: Please realize our office is not responsible for underwriting actions by the company. We strive to make all interactions positive but some things are out of our control.

name: Robin Catrett
text: Wonderful customer service. Mike and all the ladies will take good care of you.

resp.text: Robin, thank you so much for your kind words.  We appreciate you and your family.

name: Michelle Phillips
text: Great customer service!  His office staff is very professional and efficient. They are always very helpful. Couldn’t be happier with an insurance agent.

resp.text: Thanks, Michelle.  We appreciate the kind words.

name: Wendy Smith
text: If you need a friendly and helpful staff when it comes to insurance, State Farm is the way to go!! Wish I would of called sooner! Thank you Haley, Mike, and the rest of the State Farm staff for all your help!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Emily Milstead Hubbard
text: Love, love my State Farm peeps! Mike and his staff are very professional and super friendly & helpful. I would recommend them to everyone!

resp.text: Thanks, Emily!  We appreciate the feedback.

name: Lanore Smith
text: we use Mike for our insurance. Really nice guy, who cares about his customers. All the ladies at the office are wonderful and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback.

name: CARRIE MASON
text: Mike and his staff are excellent to work with. Professional people that make you feel like family!

resp.text: Thanks, Carrie....we feel the same about you guys!

name: Kathy Smith
text: Reasonable rates and nice people

resp.text: Thanks, Kathy, for the kind words.

name: Nate Epperson
text: Im a little upset with state farm right now. They dropped my parents insurance for using the insurance that they pay for. My parents had the insurance for 30 years prior and State Farm dropped it for a reason that I feel is illegitimate.

resp.text: Nate, I understand.  Please realize our office is not responsible for underwriting actions by the company.  We strive to make all interactions positive but some things are out of our control.

name: Shelly Vinson
text: We switched to them, can't believe the $ we're saving in a year

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  Glad we were able to help.

name: PHade_ghost
text: Professional

resp.text: Thanks for the input!  We appreciate you taking time to leave a review.  What can we do differently to ear that 5th star?

name: Amanda Heath
text: Great friendly place!

resp.text: Hi, Amanda...thanks for the review.  Would love to know what we could do to earn that 5th star.

name: Cobra Savi
text: Excellent Service

name: Chrissy Smith
text: Great place

resp.text: We appreciate your review!

name: Ron Daly
text:
Reggie and his team are nothing short of the best in the business. Recently I was reaching a deadline on coverage due to Gold Fortification backlogs. I left a message on a Saturday morning anticipating a callback Monday morning. What actually happened is Reggie responded back to me minutes later and advised he had addressed the issue at 6am that morning (Saturday!!!). I will say that if you are needing insurance or do not have an agent that would do this for you, I would certainly rethink what you are getting for your hard earned money.

Thank you again Reggie!

resp.text: Man. What a review! Really appreciate the kind words and the trust and business. Insurance is stressful, and doesn't always operate 9-5, so neither do we. Thanks for giving us the opportunity to help out brother.-Reggie

name: Zachery Matthews
text: Reggie and the staff here are the most amazing folks to have handle your insurance needs! They go above and beyond to make sure you are taken care of. I just moved away so I was so very sad to hear I would have to get a new insurance agent but I know I’ll be back to Alabama in the future and I will not have to figure out who to go see it will always be the wonderful staff at coastal Alabama insurance!!! Thank you for showing there is still amazing people that will help you like every one should. Again thank you for the wonderful service and treating me like family!!!!

resp.text:
Wow wow wow. Thanks so much for letting us help these past couple years, and for your time and kind words with this review. We really appreciate everything. There are a ton of choices for insurance in our area, but we strive to be better than most. Good luck up north brother. Cheers to your success!
Reggie

name: Madelaine Miller
text: I cannot give Coastal Alabama enough stars!  They were extremely, extremely responsive, friendly, and proactive.  When I had a claim for a glass chip, they called me when they saw the claim just to make sure I was okay.  Upon moving to Alabama, I chose them somewhat blindly.  I put in an online inquiry around 8:30 at night, expecting to hear back the next day or so.  Not even 15 minutes later, I received a call from Reggie!  The most outstanding insurance company I will ever use, all-around.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so so much for the kind words and taking your time to tell the world what you think about our small agency. We take our role in your busy life seriously, and know that timely communication is what you need and expect from your insurance agency. Cheers to you my friend!-Reggie

name: Justin Pratt
text: The staff here has been exceptional with our entire experience since being a client. The staff is extremely helpful and responsive and truly has had our best interest in mind. Since the Hurricane we have been constantly updated and communicated with. They have a great attitude and I'm thankful that we have chosen them to do business with. I would highly recommend them for all your insurance needs in Gulf Shores and the surrounding areas. Huge shout out as well to Kendra. We have enjoyed working with her and she is a great asset to them.

resp.text: Kendra is an angel, and she has helped HUNDREDS of friends and clients like yourself process and move through this difficult and often frustrating claims process. We at Coastal Alabama Insurance take our role seriously, and insurance is only worth as much as your claims experience. Thank you for the review, your trust and business, and your kind words.

name: Rachael Doan
text:
Reggie and his staff are the best! Every time I need something… they are on spot to help me.
After the hurricane last year and again with boat insurance. Thank you guys - Y’all are the best!!
Could do it without you!

resp.text:
Thanks Rach! Really, really appreciate the kind words, and letting us help you and your family and clients.
We take insurance seriously so you don't have to.
AND it's always nice to knock off a $1000 for your boat insurance.
Safe sailing!
Cheers,
Reggie

name: Haley Bresnahan
text: I can not say enough good things about CAI! Reggie is literally the best. The real MVP. However, ever time I’ve dealt with anyone else, they have also been top knot. Reggie handles all things insurance for my entire immediate family and he makes it so easy. I’ve relocated for work and been able to lower my rate and switch policies with zero effort on my part. I made a claim Monday night and we spoke first thing Tuesday morning. I hit a pole and he somehow made me feel like the pole hit me, and my self esteem needed that. Smooth transition into a rental and all is good. Thanks, Reggie!

resp.text:
Best. Review. Ever.
From one of the best families ever.
We are here 24/7 for all insurance needs.

name: Bethany Ashlock
text:
Working with Reggie has been the easiest process. He is a wonderful person and great insurance agent that knows what he’s talking about. We recently switched from Farmers to Reggie, the savings were unimaginable! He saved us $1000s, we are extremely happy!
I highly recommend Coastal Alabama Insurance.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review and the opportunity to help out your family and business. Even though we are hundreds of miles apart, you are in great hands having us service your many insurance needs.

name: Tim Halperin
text: Can't even begin to say how thankful I am to work with Reggie Pulliam at Coastal AL. He is always quick to respond, is personable and wants to make sure we find the best insurance solutions. Not only that, but he was able to find great savings on quotes. Huge fan of this company and will continue to work with them.

resp.text: Really appreciate the kind words, Tim. Insurance along the coast is not simple, but we research all available markets to find the best policy at the best price. Thank you for allowing us to help.

name: Anna Ksenofonovna
text:
Reggie was so helpful! He went above and beyond to get me a quote and a bunder all within 24hr.
Im so impressed with the rates and the customer service! Thank you for the amazing work!

resp.text: We strive to please my friend. Thanks for letting us help out with your immediate insurance needs and make your move to paradise easier!

name: Cassie Pulliam
text: Reggie and his team at Coastal Alabama Insurance are hands down the best in the area! They answer the phone 24/7, they are helpful (I don’t know is never a response), they will work their hardest to find you the best rates and explain your policy to you. They don’t give you an 800 number, they walk you through everything. I couldn’t ask for anything better in something as daunting as insurance. Every insurance policy you have you will want with them!

resp.text: Thanks wife!-Reggie

name: John Watters
text: It was a pleasure working with Reggie. He is a professional in his field. He saved us a ton of money on our Homeowners Insurance. It had almost doubled with our current company and he was able to get us coverage that matched the current policy for less than we paid last year.  So pleased with his ability to save us money and get us the coverage we need.

resp.text:
Really appreciate the opportunity and the kind words. We work hard to find you the best policy at the best price. While savings in premium are not always our driving force, it is always GREAT to save our friends and clients money they can use on bushwhackers.
Cheers!
Reggie

name: Candice Thaggard
text: Absolutely the best insurance company I have ever personally dealt with! Reggie is awesome and has been so patient with us and answered any and all questions we have had! Makes you feel like a friend instead of just another client!

resp.text: All of our clients are friends, even the ones we may never meet. We try to make insurance, an often confusing and frustrating enterprise, as simple as possible. Thank you first and foremost for the trust and business, and secondly for the time you took to leave these kind words. Really, really appreciate it.-Reg

name: jason rudat
text: The whole team at Coastal Alabama Insurance was fantastic! Quick response time. Very happy with their claims process and friendly service.

resp.text: Working Memorial Day weekend as I type this response filled with gratitude.

name: anne moss
text: I hate insurance. Until I found this company. They lowered my premiums substantially, while lowering my deductible amount 2%. The service is great, and everybody there truly seems to care about their customers. This is the best insurance agency I've ever used. I've been through 1 hurricane and 1 tornado with them and they made sure I was taken care of. I would never think of using another agency in this area again.

resp.text: Anne, you were one of our first clients at our small agency in 2017. And, I recall how much you HATED insurance, and you made it known to me how little you think about the business. Fast forward 4 LONG years, and we have had two major weather events and a couple of claims. Thank you for the kind words, and the continued trust to handle your insurance needs.

name: Jamie Smith
text: Reggie Pulliam is a gem!  He sacrificed a Sunday with his family to mediate and help solve a problem I was having with my roofer and insurance agent from another local insurance company.  He read emails, made calls, and gave solid advice.  (And he is not even my insurance agent, YET!). But when our policy comes due, he has definitely earned our business.  I had read many Facebook reviews about how great he was.  I also saw that he had been recognized and awarded for his hard work helping so many families that were hit by Hurricane Sally.  I cannot imagine a more dedicated agent.

resp.text: Really appreciate the kind words. Insurance is sometimes complicated and often frustrating, especially with claims. I feel it is an obligation of any insurance professional to help those, whether clients, friends, neighbors, or anybody at anytime, with their insurance questions. Thanks for the time to leave the review. Means a lot.-Reggie

name: Alvita Simmons
text: Coastal AL Insurance and Financial Services has assembled an amazing team that works tirelessly in the best interests of its clients. Could not be more pleased with the service, professionalism, and timeliness of these stellar agents.

resp.text: Not sure how we never responded to this, so I sincerely apologize about the delay. Thank you for your kind words, trust, and business. We LOVE helping you with your bonds for your clients. Really appreciate everything.

name: Forrest Forbes
text: Ms. Hagan was amazingly responsive and worked to find a policy that was in our best interest. She provided options and changed several inputs for us. She was also kind enough to gently remind me of deadlines. 😁We are quite satisfied with Coastal's service!!!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, and allowing us to help!
Jessica is simply amazing. She has the two traits insurance agents need: Compassion and competency. And she has those in spades.
Really appreciate your time for this review.

name: Chuck Beckum
text: Amanda sold us our homeowners insurance back in December. Today we were able to buy Alabama auto coverage with a great experience. Everything went very smooth and the quote we received was better than anyone’s! Give her a call!

resp.text: Welcome to the area, Chuck! Amanda is a wonderful person and a great insurance agent. She, like us, are available 24/7 if y'all ever need anything. Thank you for the kind review, and the opportunity to insure your new home.

name: Donna Perry
text:
Hi, Reggie ( Pulliam, Coastal Alabama Insurance), I just want to tell you what an outstanding employee you have in Kendra James. When she telephoned me not long after my claim was submitted, I had just received a denial and had no hope of compensation until Kendra explained my policy coverage and the claims process. She patiently guided me and consistently communicated with me every step of the way.

Kendra’s expertise, professionalism and courteous customer service are truly an asset to your agency and will greatly enhance its future success. Thank you for the pleasure of working with her.

Regards,
Donna Perry
Hattiesburg, MS

resp.text:
Thank you so much, Donna. We take claims seriously at our agency, and Sally, while stressful, has given us the opportunity to show our local community and friends and clients how valuable great insurance agents are. Kendra is a blessing to all who know her. She is INCREDIBLE!
So many times, we have held firm, pointed to the contract (which you and others pay for), and demanded rightful compensation. It isn't always an easy or quick process, but we are resolved in our process at our agency.

name: Michael McCracken
text: I’ve been doing business with Reggie for a few years and we had an incident with a contractor and he stepped up and helped me not get taken advantage of. We recently added a few more policies and he was “Johnny-on-the-spot!”  He’s just a phone call away and will provide exceptional customer service!  Give him a call today!

resp.text: You're my hero, Doc! Geaux Tigahs!  On a semi-serious note, we really do appreciate the trust and business. We know you have a TON of choices when it comes to insuring your assets, and I am truly honored to have your business. Cheers!-Reg

name: Sandra Brown
text: Without saying anything negative about anyone else,  I would like to say that I am thankful I purchased additional insurance beyond my coverage with my Condo Association with Coastal Alabama Insurance. Not only is Coastal, thus far, the only help I have received from the damages of Sally; but, my Agent, Mr. Reggie Pulliam, is going over and beyond to help me get my condo well taken care of.  I don’t know what I would have done with having Coastal’s Insurance. I am, equally, thankful to have an Agent who cares. Mr. Pulliam and his staff are professional, polite and there to help, not only in a time of insurance need; but, doing so efficiently and graciously.

resp.text: All we can say is WOW. Those beautiful words we will cherish forever. Thank you so, so much for your thoughtful, kind words. Catastrophic claims have been simply overwhelming for us and our agency and our clients and our community, but we are striving day and night to perform our trusted duty as agents, and we really appreciate the amazing feedback and review.

name: Ark Restoration
text: Very unprofessional, makes false statements about “LOCAL” companies ! Just to make him self look good and that he is an outstanding citizen in the community!  As a well known company that has many references through out this community! I strongly think I would look somewhere else for your insurance needs . He will turn on you in the blink of an eye ..we were insured with him and he gave us a bad review with out speaking with us and knowing anything about the loss . Definitely will turn on you wether you are insured with him or not .

resp.text:
Don’t we insure you?
Haha
Nice edit, bro.

name: Andra Brewer
text: Great experience with Coastal AL Insurance. I needed a policy for a refi, right after Hurricane Sally and Amanda went above and beyond to make it happen despite being completely swamped with claims from the storm. She even called me after hours from home to get info and get the policy done for me. I feel like I now have my insurance with someone I can actually trust that is looking out for me. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND AMANDA! You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Amanda is amazing. Thank you for your patience and understanding, and for allowing us to help you out.

name: Maegan Raley
text: On a 5 star scale, Reggie deserves 7!! He takes customer service to a whole different level. It doesn't matter if its day or night, a weekday or the weekend. If you have questions or need ANYTHING, all you have to do is text him & he'll do whatever he can to take care of your needs. Their prices are the absolute best around!! Coastal Alabama Insurance (& Reggie) are truly top notch!!!

resp.text:
Maegan,
Thank you for allowing us to help. We strive to be an insurance agency for the 21st Century, which means (to us) that you can text when you get off work, and have everything handled when it is convenient for you. Appreciate everything!

name: Sean Worley
text: Reggie has been my agent for a few years now on multiple policies and has processed a few claims for us. Great customer service!

resp.text: Really appreciate the opportunity to help out. Even though you're located in the Great State of Oklahoma, and we're located in Gulf Shores, with today's technology and ability to communicate, doing business and handling your few claims has been incredibly easy, and we're glad to always be here for you and your family and clients.

name: B M
text: Coastal Alabama Insurance has excellent customer service. They will return your call promptly.  I've used them in both a personal and professional capacity. When I have referred clients, they have taken excellent care of them. I recently switched my car insurance to Coastal Alabama. They found better much better auto coverage for me at a lower rate. They even went through the process of correcting incorrect information on the insurance report.

resp.text: Man. What a review! Your kind words and trust with your insurance needs mean the world to us. Thank you for everything man.-Reg

name: Morris Ronnebaum
text: Mr. Reggie Pullman is the insurance agent you want to go with. He did an excellent job with our condo claim. Had a check in hand within days of filing.Always answers his phone and friendly to work with. A+ agent!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and taking the time to leave the review. Really glad to walk you through the claims experience.

name: Karin H.
text: How often do you have a great experience shopping for insurance? Well, Reggie and his staff at Coastal Alabama Insurance made it easy! He suggested and found, far better coverage with an "A" rated insurer for hundreds less. I will be sharing his contact info with family and friends. Thanks Reggie!

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing us to help. Hope we have earned our keep through this long hurricane claim process.

name: Jeff Davies
text: This insurance company has your back! After hurricane Sally the entire team especially Kendra was there when we needed them the most!

resp.text: Kendra is an angel sent to you and us from the insurance gods, to make sure claims are handled professionally and as expeditiously as possible. We're sorry you've been through a hurricane, but like the 648 claims we are handling, we have done our absolute best. Thank you for letting us help out.

name: Karen Hendrix
text: Reggie has been fantastic from the beginning!  He is the most personable and the most helpful person I have worked with in the insurance industry.  He did an outstanding job of getting a quote back to me very quickly late on a Friday afternoon and completed everything in lightning speed once I made my decision. I highly recommend his company for any insurance needs. They really work to earn your business and your trust.

resp.text: WOW! Thank you so much Karen for the kind words, trust, and business. Means the world to us. We strive to be an insurance agency for the 21st Century, where service and communication are expedited by our data tools to make insurance easy. REALLY APPRECIATE EVERYTHING!-Reggie

name: Kristi Krajicek
text: Reggie and his staff have been hands down the very best agents I’ve ever worked with. He is willing to go above and beyond. When our daughter was in an accident (her first) he treated her with so much respect and kindness. I truly appreciated treating Her compassionately but also respectfully through her first adult experience. We will recommend him every time.

resp.text:
It’s our pleasure, and what we do. Thank you for your very kind words.
While we don’t look forward to accidents and claims, we strive to handle them as delicately and quickly as possible.

name: Christopher Peters
text: They went above and beyond to do good business.

resp.text:
Really appreciate the kind words and opportunity to help you out.
Geaux Tigers!

name: Whitney (Mac) Mcmahan
text: Coastal Alabama Insurance is 100% the best agency. Reggie and his team are amazing and work very hard to overcome any problematic situation.They are guaranteed to find you the best rates and insurance that is suitable to you. This agency does everything they can to help in any situation. Also they are always going the extra mile to provide opportunities to get to know their clients and provide them with an enjoyable experience every time you see them. I would definitely recommend Costal Alabama Insurance. If you aren't with Costal Alabama you're truly missing out.

resp.text: Thanks Whitney. We do our best to focus on your insurance so you can focus more time on graduating!!-Reggie

name: Susan Pulliam
text: Coastal Alabama Insurance has been my insurance company for many years and I have had outstanding customer service. My homeowners and automobile insurance rates continue to be lower than all of the competitors. I highly recommend Coastal Alabama Insurance for all of your insurance needs.

resp.text: Full disclosure America: this is my loving mother, and while I am her insurance agent as well, she is typing out of love, not business appreciation.

name: Andy K
text: Working with Katelyn has been awesome! She is very professional and responsive. I will be staying with Coastal Alabama Insurance for many years to come.

resp.text: Katelyn was a great asset to our agency while she was here for that year. Even though she is no longer here, and we're not Allstate, you're in good hands.

name: Bobbi Fazekas McGhee
text: Reggie and his staff are very helpful navigating the insurance waters with you. They will find the best offers with the most coverage.  He will recommend additional options but is not pushy with his recommendations. Regardless, Reggie will provide the information to you and help you to choose what is best for your family or business.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and time, Bobbi. Really appreciate everything you've done and continue to do. We do our best to make insurance easy.-Reggie

name: Tammy Tarpley
text:
To whom it may concern,
Reggie has met all of our needs and is a great and outstanding individual and will have our business from here forward. He is a very personable guy and we got along from the start even over the phone. He even went as far as realizing we are from Louisiana and love our food, recommended the best places to dine!!!
I would recommend him to anyone as an agent for themselves!!!

resp.text: Man! What a review. Thank y'all so much for everything. Least I could do is send you to some great local restaurants. Cheers to your new life in paradise and thanks again for letting us help out with your insurance needs. And, GEAUX TIGAHS!-Reggie

name: Anchor Air
text: Reggie and Jessica have been great to work with and we highly recommend them!  We appreciate how quick they are to respond to everything we need and can not express enough how thankful we are for all of there hard work! What a GREAT TEAM!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your time, trust, and business. We strive to make insurance easy, and hope we continue to do all we can to free up your time to continue to grow your great business. Thanks again.

name: m viguera
text: Excellent service from Amanda!!! Thank you for your prompt service.

resp.text: Amanda is AMAZING! Thank you so much for letting us help.

name: Michael Kelly
text: Had a fantastic experience with Reginald Pulliam! Easily the easiest and most stress free insurance transaction I have ever experienced, and I worked in the business for years. Saved me money and answered all questions and concerns promptly and professionally. Super nice person and professional. Customer for life!!! Thank you again. Made my day!!

resp.text: Man. Thanks so much for the trust and business. We are an insurance agency for the 21st Century. Michael texted the agency, and the transaction from his home in Louisiana took 5 minutes, and we saved him a decent amount of money. We don't always save money for clients, but we write good policies at good prices. Thanks again-Reggie

name: Ava Trahan
text: Reggie and his team at Coastal Alabama Insurance are one of a kind! They are very knowledgeable with up to date info and resources, and have gone above and beyond to help in times when it was needed most.

resp.text: Ava, you and Cory are our people! Thank you so much for the kind words and allowing us to help out with your insurance needs. We are all in this crazy world together. Cheers!-Reg

name: John Hawk
text: Highest rate quotes that I've ever been given! Not sure how they can stay in business charging theses kind of ridiculous high rates?

resp.text: I, Reggie Pulliam, just got off the phone with Mr Hawk. Mr Hawk has been looking at several properties to buy in our area, and has chosen one in Elberta, AL. He contacted us for a home insurance quote, and we shopped all available markets to us and gave him a price. He was unsatisfied with the price. The price which we can't control. I asked him if he had received other proposals, and he had not. I explained to him that insurance along the Gulf Coast is much different than in Ohio, and that the price of $3,000 isn't out of line with our market. I asked how he can consider our price high if he had not received other proposals. He then said if he can't get better offers he would give us a call back. I asked him not to.-Reggie C Pulliam

name: Marina Perkins
text: This is like family.  Very comfortable and knowledgeable.  You know you are in good hands as soon as you call. Wonderful service and affordable with great coverage.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We strive to treat all like family, which is why we forward the phones on nights and weekends to an agent, in case of an emergency. Really, really appreciate everything.

name: Kelly Lankford
text: I personally have my home owners insurance company with this company and they saved me a good bit of money with the same if not more coverage than the prior company.  I am also a local mortgage lender and they have been helping save my clients on their insurance. They are quick to get a quote and get the deal done.  John Anderson is my personal contact and does an amazing job.

resp.text: Thank you for everything, Kelly. We love servicing your needs, along with your multitude of clients. You do great work! We appreciate everything.

name: Ranae Hagan
text: Coastal Alabama Insurance in Gulf Shores is by far the best experience I’ve ever had with the insurance industry.  Reggie and his team are knowledgeable, personable, and very enthusiastic. Jessica went above and beyond to meet all of my insurance needs. I will recommend this group to everyone.

resp.text: Thanks you so much for allowing us to help with your insurance needs. Means a lot to our small agency. Jessica is simply amazing, and is growing daily in her insurance career.

name: Mark S
text: Amazing experience. Katelyn was extremely knowledgable and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing Katelyn to service your insurance needs. We appreciate the trust and business.

name: Jeff Hodges
text: Reggie and his team couldn’t have been better.  From fast email responses, to working diligently to find me the best rates.  He did the research and saved me over $8,000 year on my flood insurance after a FEMA remapping.  Highly recommend and I’ve already told 5 neighbors to get a quote from him.

resp.text: Happy to help with your insurance needs Jeff. We think it really helps to know the market along the coast for our clients and their investments and homes. Thanks for letting us help out with this, and thank you so much for letting others know about what we do.

name: Randall Clark
text: Excellent experience with this agency !! Katelyn Hatfield was the best. Finally a decent wind insurance option that gave me peace of mind that is much better than AIUA !!

resp.text: AIUA is the K-Mart of insurance, and we hope to bring friends and clients, slowly but surely, away from their product. Thank you for the review, and for the kind words. Katelyn is beyond amazing!-Reggie

name: ivy wildcat

name: Scott Sexton
text: I have worked with Coastal Alabama Insurance for over 2 years and have been pleasantly surprised by their Professionalism and Attention to detail.   After a recent automobile wreck, Coastal Insurance informed me of Diminished Value......I have been driving for more than 30 years and have had 3 or 4 claims during that time.   Not once has any other Insurance Agency ever informed  me of Diminished Value ---- After a claim, most Insurance Companies do in fact pay the claim, but your car is now worth less than it was prior to the accident, even after repairs;  this is obvious to most people.  What is Not obvious or well known, is that Reputable Carriers will also pay you an amount of money, based on a particular formula, in addition to paying for the cost of the repairs.  This additional money covers the reduced value of your car --- but your Insurance Company will not tell you about this.....Reggie, with Coastal Insurance, not only told me about this, but his website even has a calculator for customers to determine the approximate amount of additional money you may be entitled to receive.

resp.text: Your words mean the world to us. Thank you for your trust and business. Glad we could help you out and hopefully our information will help others, whether they are clients or just people looking for professional agents who can help out in their times of need.

name: Ruth Hearne
text:
All three women that work there have dismissed all my questions and requests and I've been made to feel it's because I'm a young adult, despite it being my money that I'm using to pay for my car insurance for my own car, that I also bought with my money. However, as soon as my mom goes there for me to ask questions about my account, they answer every questions perfectly with excellent explanations. This has been going on for the past two years I've been with them and has happened twice in the past four weeks. I also don't understand why they keep telling me they're not capable of printing out a breakdown of my accounts and also keep telling me that they have no explanation for changes made to my account. I'm also told that they are incapable of notifying me of any changes made to my account. So I keep finding out that they're overcharging me after the fact. They are very short and rude with me but as soon as my mother steps in they are polite and give her all the answers I have been trying to ask. I have tried to resolve these issues with them multiple times but they refuse to talk to me. They shut down and just keep repeating "I can't do that it's out of my hands" to every single question I have about my account, but they give all answers and explanations to my mom.

Update: I called headquarters today and who I spoke with said "if she can pull up your breakdown on her computer and tell you what's going on with your account there's no reason she cant give that to you." The person at headquarters i spoke with immediately emailed me my breakdown and reviewed it with me in real time. I was also told I should be getting letters in the mail with updates on any and all changes (which i never have gotten and I've been asking this office to fix) so the lady at headquarters made a note on my account for that to be fixed.

name: Cherie Seier
text: I can’t even begin to describe my wonderful experience with Lee Anne at State Farm without crying. She’s coddled me for a whole year since I signed up with her for my auto insurance. Going above and beyond is and understatement!!!!! I had a wreck on my way to work this morning (car probably totaled they said). Anyway, I freaked and called her personal number after I could get anyone at the office. She calmed me down over the phone and took care of everything from there (I was a shaken up, hot mess). She ordered a tow truck that obviously got lost or confused, but she kept in touch with me minute by minute. She finally said “enough is enough, I’m picking you up myself”. She quickly drove from Helena to 280 to meet me, gathered my belongings (which were many), loaded me up in her Jeep and drove me to enterprise (where she had already called with all info on the way). We get to Enterprise and I was there maybe 10 minutes before I drove off in the rental car. Before she left, she said “take care of my baby”. I started bawling from pure gratitude. Her response: “there’s no crying in baseball” and gave me a hug!!!! Too bad, Corona!!!! I finally got to meet my personal angel in person after a year of driving her nuts on the phone. She still kept in touch till the end. On our ride to Enterprise, she calmed my nerves and explained everything to me about my coverage etc. She is so refreshing after all of the horrible things going on in our world today. Friends Forever I’m pretty sure! I love this lady!!!!!!!! Jerrod Gibson at State Farm has a gem with her!!!!! Thank you Frand and that you State Farm for having this unbelievable human working for you! I could go on but I’ll stop at that!

name: Sara He
text:
So I have been with Rick Phyfer and his team at State Farm for a year and a half now. Prior to being with State Farm, I was with Allstate in Spanish Fort.

I loved State Farm when I had them in Tuscaloosa, and decided I wanted to be back with the first insurance company that I loved. So, I switched over at the end of December 2016, and my policy started in January 2017. Well, in January 2017, not even ONE FULL MONTH into being with Rick's agency, I wrecked my car... and 3 other cars. I hit a car, which then hit a car (which they totaled out) which hit another car. 4 car, $29,000 wreck, apparently.

Of course I was freaking out they would drop me - I hadn't even been with them an entire month! But they didn't. They had faith in me, and they kept me. And, they fixed my car! I was worried it would be totaled but it was fixed, good as new. I'm still driving it today. I also have renter's insurance through Rick and his crew.

A special shout out to Heather Smith, who is AN ABSOLUTE LIFE-SAVER. She has been able to constantly answer my questions and has been so incredibly personable. I feel like we could have Thanksgiving together and it wouldn't be weird. She is such an asset to Rick's office. When I email her or call the office, I get an automatic response and having someone like that on your team who is such an effective and efficient communicator is absolutely invaluable.

Rick, Heather, and the entire team have been absolutely wonderful to work with and have taken great care of me. If you are looking for a great insurance company in Fairhope, look no further!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Sara! We know that auto accidents are never fun to go through, but I am happy that your insurance claim went smoothly and that you are happy with the customer service you have received. We look forward to bringing you that same quality for years to come!

name: Michael Hamilton
text:
We had a terrible experience with Allstate and the Bryan Sheffield agency did nothing to help.   I have been a customer of this agency (policies including homeowner’s, multiple autos, and a boat) for approximately 5 years.  I had a claim due to a flash flood damaging a vehicle.  The claim process was a nightmare, mostly due to working with virtual/out-of-state adjusters (something Bryan’s agency was apparently unaware of).

It took over a month to get the claim settled - currently on day 34 and the claim is still open.  The car was eventually totaled on day 22, but later Allstate decided they would rescind that decision and repair it (after I had purchased a replacement).  Later, they changed again and totaled it.

On day 13, I emailed the office manager and asked that Bryan call me.  I understand the agency does not directly deal with claims, but they can assist and advise where necessary, especially when the process is a bad experience for their customers.  Instead, his office manager called me, provided no assistance, and seemed surprised that Allstate does not have auto adjusters in Birmingham (where this agency is selling auto policies).

According to the multiple solicitation emails I receive weekly, customer service is very important to this agency.  I have emailed Bryan three times and asked that he call me as stated above.  As of today (day 34), Bryan has not called nor contacted me outside of solicitation emails trying to sell me additional products and services.

I eventually had to file a formal Department of Insurance complaint against the company and the agency.  If you make the mistake of choosing Allstate as your insurer, I would highly recommend finding a different agent.

name: Tim Harden
text:
Hurricane Sally damaged my Alabama condominium in September of 2020 but fortunately I was insured through First Baldwin Insurance.  My experience with this team and the Insurance Adjuster has been nothing short of "better than expected".  This being the first time I have ever been involved in a claim of this type and magnitude, I had many questions and concerns, starting with "where to start?".

Immediately after the storm, I received a Claim Number via email with a note saying I would be contacted by an Adjuster "ASAP".  It was so helpful to have the process started for me.  First Baldwin Insurance's team of Valerie Miller and Michelle Thomas were extremely helpful and always provided excellent customer service in addressing my questions and concerns - THANK YOU BOTH!  Not only did they help with this claim, they provided valuable insight for my renewal to even be better protected should a similar event occur.

I worked with both Michelle and Valerie on my initial insurance policy and based upon the results of my coverage, I am extremely pleased with the advice and coverage my policy provided me.  THANK YOU BOTH AGAIN!

The Adjuster, Chris Van Wert of Harbor Claims, was nothing short of phenomenal as well.  After an initial call explaining my situation, I sent Chris details for my claim.  My claim was immediately approved and within days, I received a check.  Chris explained to me how my policy applied to my claim.  When calling Chris, he dropped everything he was doing to assist me. He is extremely customer service focused and very professional.

While having to deal with an insurance claim and the related damages is not pleasant, I wanted to share that my claim experience with Michelle, Valerie and Chris, has been nothing short of phenomenal!  I highly recommend working with these organizations!

Timothy Harden, Gulf Shores, AL

resp.text: Hearing that you had “better than expected” experience is the best thing we could hope for! Your recommendation means a lot to us. Thank you for choosing First Baldwin Insurance. We wish you the best and look forward to serving you for many years to come!

text: I have never had so much trouble getting ahold of not just the agent assigned to me but anyone that could help. I remember emailing Michelle and she ignored every email and call. Michelle said she would get it handled when I called to ask what it meant because my roof was NEW. I never received any further notices or proof of such and have another new agent since and I get it is hard to get a call back after a hurricane but 3 weeks when I Ieft vms and sent emails to multiple reps? Everyone should be used to working remote by now so a damaged building is no excuse. I have heard from other friends in area that they were not happy either with co. so surprised at ratings. All the money I spend in insurance and wind and hail, I get screwed over without an explanation and no coverage for any damages.

resp.text:
Thank you, Jess, for taking the time to give us your feedback. We're sorry that you feel that your experience has not been positive, and we would like to look into the matter further.  Meanwhile, our operations director will be in touch with you before she leaves the office this afternoon.

We acknowledge that you may have recently experienced longer-than-normal wait times when calling our team. Unusually high call volumes and more complex calls stemming from Hurricane Sally-related impacts on policyholders have driven these service delays. We continue to focus on working with our customers to provide flexibility in each unique situation during these extraordinary times.

We’ve already taken aggressive steps to address the delays without compromising our commitment to helping you navigate this challenging climate. We expect wait times will improve over the week or so, returning to normal in November.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

We paid $7500 plus in yard and tree clean up out of pocket/loan.
When tried to reinsure w First Baldwin and spoken with them several times from Oct 2020 to March 2021- I kept being told they were so behind ? And they assured me they would give quote soon.  July 2021... No quote yet. We went with another company and then sold our place.
Disappointed.
